sentences.sContent: When performing taint flow analysis, the scanner models the flow of data within the system.
sentences.sContent_eng: When performing taint flow analysis, the scanner models the flow of data within the system.
sentences.sCn: 当执行污染流分析时，检测器会在这个系统中为数据流建立模型。

trans.tranOther: to damage something by adding an unwanted substance to it
